thread.title: Molly Malone's to hold red-head competition Oct. 9 thru 11
thread.title_full: Molly Malone's to hold red-head competition Oct. 9 thru 11

title: Molly Malone's to hold red-head competition Oct. 9 thru 11
text:
Molly Malone's to hold red-head competition Oct. 9 thru 11 A little bit of the Emerald Isle is coming to Molly Malone's right here in Louisville. Post to Facebook Molly Malone's to hold red-head competition Oct. 9 thru 11 A little bit of the Emerald Isle is coming to Molly Malone's right here in Louisville.  //on.whas11.com/1Llx12e   Molly Malone's to hold red-head competition Oct. 9 thru 11 WHAS Staff, WHAS11.com 8:18 a.m. EDT October 9, 2015 Molly Malone will be playing host to a sea of red hair. (Photo: WHAS 11) CONNECT TWEET   
LOUISVILLE, Ky (WHAS11) -- A little bit of the Emerald Isle is coming to Molly Malone's right here in Louisville. 
Redheads from across the globe head to Ireland each year for the International Convention of Redheads. Now that tradition is hopping across the pond to right here in Louisville. 
Louisville's version of the event will start Friday night at 9 p.m. at Molly Malone's in the Highlands and will go through Sunday. There will be lots of contests for things such as the most freckles, reddest of beards and even the greenest eyes. Even man's best friend gets a red based award. 
For more information, head on over to the WHAS 11 newslinks tab on the left side here .  //on.whas11.com/1Llx12e More Stories
